articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Reveals New Pre-Order Distribution, Available In Two Countries - Nintendo Life
articles.description: For trainers located in Japan and Australia

articles.title: Marvel's New Beat 'Em Up 'Cosmic Invasion' Reveals Two More Playable Characters - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Joining the fight on Switch platforms later this year

articles.title: Steam and Itch.io Are Pulling ‘Porn’ Games. Critics Say It’s a Slippery Slope to More Censorship - WIRED
articles.description: A conservative group is targeting payment processors as “a weapon” to get adult games deindexed in storefronts. Even games that have nothing to do with sex or abuse have been caught in the dragnet.

articles.title: ‘NASCAR 25’ console game set for October 2025 release date - NASCAR.com
articles.description: iRacing and NASCAR revealed that 'NASCAR 25' is launching on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S on Oct. 14, 2025, with PC via Steam at a later date.

articles.title: Google rethinks search results with its new AI-curated ‘Web Guide’ - The Verge
articles.description: Google is testing Web Guide in its Search Labs, a new generative AI feature that users can opt into for Gemini-curated search results.
